description: What is the installed power capacity in megawatts for FY 2016?
Identify the financial year with the highest installed power capacity.
Determine the range of installed power capacities across the financial years.
Calculate the total installed power capacity from FY 2014 to FY 2018.
Identify any financial year that has a significantly lower installed power capacity compared to others.
Order the financial years from the lowest to the highest installed power capacity.
Examine if there is a correlation between the financial year and the installed power capacity.
Which financial years have an installed power capacity greater than 25,000 megawatts?
Identify any clusters of financial years with similar installed power capacities.
Determine the percentage of financial years with an installed power capacity higher than 20,000 megawatts.
